user_query: you drive 200 miles in 3 hours before stopping for 30 minutes for lunch and gas . after lunch you travel 150 miles in an hour and a half . what was your average speed for the trip ?
chatgpt_response:
The average speed for the trip can be calculated using the formula: Average speed = Total distance / Total time
Total distance = 200 miles + 150 miles = 350 miles
Total time = 3 hours + 1.5 hours + 0.5 hours (30 minutes for lunch and gas)
Total time = 5 hours
Average speed = 350 miles / 5 hours = 70 miles per hour
So, the average speed for the trip was 70 miles per hour.
